#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

The following:

 * _urn:oor:colore:ontologies_ is the directory of all COLORE ontologies.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:ontology:{ontology_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:ontology:{ontology_name}_ is the directory of all named cl-texts and cl-modules comprising the COLORE ontology identified by _ontology_name_.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:ontology:{ontology_name}:text:{text_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:category:{category_name}_ is the directory of all COLORE ontologies belonging to _category_name_.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:ontology:{ontology_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:categories_ is the directory of all categories supported by COLORE.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:category:{category_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:user:{user_name}_ is the directory of all categories supported by COLORE.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:category:{category_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:{owner_name}_ is the directory of all COLORE ontologies owned by _owner_name_.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:{ontology_name}_.

 * _urn:oor:colore:{ontology_name}:{text_name}:clif_ is the content of the cl-text identified by _text_name_ belonging to the COLORE ontology specified by _ontology_name_.  Note that _text_name_ may refer to either a named cl-text or a cl-module.  This resource is represented as a string of valid CLIF text.

 * _urn:oor:colore:{text_name}:imports_ is the directory representing the transitive closure of all named cl-texts and cl-modules associated with the cl-text identified by _text_name_ belonging to the COLORE ontology specified by _ontology_name_.  This resource is represented as a list of URN strings of the form _urn:oor:colore:{ontology_name}:{text_name}_.
